```{r}
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
library(plyr)
library(dplyr)
library(svMisc)
library(plotrix)
library(zoo)
#load files
setwd("/Users/iwargowsky/Desktop/Fluxnet2015")
flux.CUT <- read.csv("CUTfluxnetpermonth.csv")
flux.VUT <- read.csv("VUTfluxnetpermonth.csv")

allflux<- merge(flux.CUT,flux.VUT)

#create timestamp variable for x axis
allflux$ts = as.yearmon(paste(allflux$year,allflux$month,sep = '-'))

```

```{r, label=CA-Gro, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(data = subset(allflux,allflux$site_id=='CA-Gro'))+theme_bw()+ggtitle('CA-Gro')+
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0)+
  geom_line(aes(ts,NEE_VUT_REF, group= site_id, color="VUT"))+
  geom_line(aes(ts,NEE_CUT_REF, group= site_id, color="CUT"))
```
